mapper.select: select order_details.order_no,orders.order_time,express.express_name,sum(order_details.discount_price) sum_price from orders ,express ,order_details where #{account}=orders.account and orders.order_no=order_details.order_no and express.express_no=orders.express_no group by order_details.order_no,orders.order_time,express.express_name
